p: A paired t-test was used for comparisons of ERP and WOV before and after stimulations. ANOVA for repeated measurements was used for comparisons of ERP or WOV among different stimulation strategies and followed by post hoc testing (least significant differences) for comparisons of the ERP and WOV at the end of each subsequent stimulation strategy vs. ERP and WOV in the baseline state. Statistical significance was defined as P â‰¤ 0.05.
